DOC.brief_title: Thoracoabdominal Aortic Aneurysms With Fenestrated Branched Stent Grafts
DOC.detailed_description: This traditional device feasibility study intend generate preliminary safety efficacy information may use plan appropriate future study , inform product development . The study prospective , non-randomized , non-blinded , single-arm , single-center study . The purpose study evaluate clinical outcome quality life measure consecutive cohort patient treat endovascular aortic repair thoracoabdominal aortic aneurysm ( type I IV ) use Zenith t-Branch customized physician-specified stent-graft combination fenestration and/or branch .
DOC.criteria: General 1 . Thoracoabdominal aortic aneurysm diameter ≥ 5.5 cm 2 time normal aortic diameter . 2 . Aneurysm history growth ≥ 0.5 cm per year . 3 . Saccular aneurysm deem significant risk rupture base upon physician interpretation . General 1 . Less 18 year age 2 . Unwilling comply followup schedule 3 . Inability refusal give informed consent patient legally authorize representative 4 . Pregnant breastfeed 5 . Life expectancy < 2 year 6 .
